The Australian independence movement has finally reached a head, and it’s time that the British Empire finally allowed the island continent of Australia to move forward from its previous prison colony history into a new world of democracy.

The Australian independence movement has finally reached a head, and it’s time that the British Empire finally allowed the island continent of Australia to move forward from its previous prison colony history into a new world of democracy.
Australia federated into six separate states and gained its independence.

The institution of this assimilation program has been discussed by the leaders of our nation before, and now is a perfect time to properly bring people to Turkishness and honour. This will, of course, create unrest throughout our nation and cause the international community to look down upon us.

ENGLISH: The USA had the audacity of declaring that our rightful land belonged to them and them alone. In light of the USA’s weakness and our prestige and standing in the world, we will convince the international community to support our refutal of their unmitigated expansionism!

Lincoln had it all wrong. This nation’s woes stem from the freedom of the Negroes, and our recent political movements have proven this to be so. We must reinstitute slavery to provide a better economy for our nation and a better future for our children.

ENGLISH: Active persecution of minorities within our country has brought us to the brink of instability and drawn the ire of the world. We should revoke these policies.
We must remove the Turks to make our nation strong and glorious, these disgusting Turkish people only inhibit our ability to govern effectively.
The Turkish are removed, our nation is now in a position to become strong once again.

Our country has been plagued for far too long by people not of our culture. These people are bringing down our economy, causing all our problems, and are the source of all our woes. We should institute a program to remove these people from our glorious country.

Our country has been plagued for far too long by people not of our culture. These people are bringing down our economy, causing all our problems, and are the source of all our woes. We should institute a program to remove these people from our glorious country.

Although Russia put the Caucasian War on hold during their wars with Persia and the Ottoman Empire, now Russia has a chance to save face and ensure its hegemony over the Caucasus. This is not a decision to be taken lightly, as the war has raged in one form or another since 1763.

Stellen Sie die Ordnung wieder her

ENGLISH: Annex a foreign §Ycountry§W all provinces of which are your cores.
FRENCH: Annexez un §Ypays§W étranger dont toutes les provinces sont vos territoires clés.
GERMAN: Annektieren Sie alle Provinzen eines ausländischen §YLandes§W, die zu Ihren Kernprovinzen gehören.

ENGLISH: Force another §Ycountry§W, which has thrown off all pretences of civilized conduct in the realm of international affairs, to vastly reduce its ambitions.
FRENCH: Obligez un autre §Ypays§W, qui s'est débarrassé de tout faux-semblant de conduite civilisée au royaume des affaires internationales, à limiter considérablement ses ambitions.
GERMAN: Zwingen Sie ein anderes §YLand§W, das bezüglich internationaler Beziehungen sämtliche Vortäuschungen zivilisierten Benehmens über Bord geworfen hat, seine Ambitionen drastisch zu reduzieren.

ENGLISH: Contain $RECIPIENT$ by reducing their territory, prestige and military.
FRENCH: Confinez $RECIPIENT$ en réduisant son territoire, son prestige et son armée.
GERMAN: Halten Sie $RECIPIENT$ in Schach, indem Sie ihr Territorium, Prestige und Militär reduzieren.

ENGLISH: Force an §Yuncivilized country§W to secede territory to form a colonial concession.
FRENCH: Obligez un §Ypays non civilisé§W à faire sécession d'un territoire pour former une concession coloniale.
GERMAN: Zwingen Sie ein §Yunzivilisiertes Land§W, Gebiete zur Gründung einer Kolonie abzuspalten.

ENGLISH: Demand that $RECIPIENT$ secede territory to form a colonial concession.
FRENCH: Demandez à ce que $RECIPIENT$ fasse sécession d'un territoire pour former une concession coloniale.
GERMAN: Verlangen Sie, dass $RECIPIENT$ Gebiete zur Gründung einer Kolonie abspaltet.

ENGLISH: Attempt to intervene in a war, neglecting any side to fulfil their §Ywargoals§W
FRENCH: Tenter de participer à une guerre en négligeant les différents camps pour atteindre les §Yobjectifs de guerre§W
GERMAN: Versuchen Sie, in einen Krieg zu intervenieren und beiden Seiten die Erreichung ihrer §YKriegsziele§W zu verwehren.

ENGLISH: All we ask is to be left alone
FRENCH: Nous demandons juste à ce qu'on nous laisse tranquilles.
GERMAN: Wir wollen nur in Ruhe gelassen werden.

ENGLISH: Cease the Balkan Assimilation Program blank

Opposition to the Balkan Assimilation Program is not limited to those suffering under its machinations. Leaders in our nation have spoken out against it and perhaps it is time to cease the program, perhaps for good. It will cease the associated unrest and cause other nations to look kindly upon us.

The Turks had the audacity to try to destroy our culture. Although we have changed its purpose to suit our needs, have we not learned from the experience? We should do unto others as we wish to have done to us. We are better than the Turks, surely!
